router-config.title: Router Configuration
router-config.info: Here you can configure how many hops the connections must pass through other Skywire visors before reaching the final destination. NOTE: the changes will not affect the existing routes.

settings.title: Settings

password.initial-config-help: Use this option for setting the initial password. After a password has been set, it is not possible to use this option to modify it.

initial-config.title: Set initial password
initial-config.done: Password set. Please use it to access the system.
initial-config.error: Error. Please make sure you have not already set the password.

errors.bad-old-password: The provided old password is not correct.

updater-config.open-confirmation: The updater settings are for experienced users only. Are you sure you want to continue?
updater-config.help: Use this form for overriding the settings that will be used by the updater. All empty fields will be ignored. The settings will be used for all updating operations, no mater which element is being updated, so please be careful.
updater-config.not-saved: The changes have not been saved yet.
updater-config.saved: The custom settings have been saved.
updater-config.removed: The custom settings have been removed.
updater-config.save-confirmation: Are you sure you want to apply the custom settings?
updater-config.remove-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove the custom settings?

settings.refresh-rate-help: Time the system waits to update the data automatically.

reboot.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reboot the visor?

apps-list.unavailable-logs-error: Unable to show the logs while the app is not running.

vpn-socks-server-settings.new-password: New password (Leave empty to remove the password)

vpn-socks-server-settings.change-passowrd-confirmation: Are you sure you want to change the password?

vpn-socks-client-settings.password-history-warning: Note: the password will not be saved in the history.
vpn-socks-client-settings.copied-pk-info: The public key has been copied.
vpn-socks-client-settings.copy-pk-error: There was a problem copying the public key.
vpn-socks-client-settings.no-elements: Currently there are no elements to show. Please try again later.
vpn-socks-client-settings.no-elements-for-filters: There are no elements that meet the filter criteria.

vpn-socks-client-settings.default-note-warning: The default note has been used.
vpn-socks-client-settings.killswitch-info: When active, all network connections will be disabled if the app is running but the VPN protection is interrupted (for temporary errors or any other problem). This avoids data leaks.
vpn-socks-client-settings.settings-changed-alert: The changes have not been saved yet.

password-dialog.title: Enter Password
password-dialog.info: You are being asked for a password because a password was set when the selected entry was created, but the it was not saved for security reasons. You can leave the password empty if needed.

errors.remote-key-chars-error: The remote public key must only contain hexadecimal characters.

selection.disable-autostart-all: Disable autostart for all selected apps

refresh-button.error-tooltip: There was an error updating the data. Retrying automatically every {{ time }} seconds...

vpn.title: VPN Control Panel
vpn.starting-blocked-server-error: Unable to connect to the selected server because it has been added to the blocked servers list.
vpn.unexpedted-error: An unexpected error occurred and the operation could not be completed.
vpn.remote-access-title: It appears that you are accessing the system remotely
vpn.remote-access-text: This application only allows you to manage the VPN protection of the device on which it was installed. Changes made with it will not affect remote devices like the one you seem to be using. Also, the displayed IP data may be incorrect.

server-change.busy-error: The system is busy. Please wait.
server-change.backend-error: It was not possible to change the server. Please make sure the public key is correct and the VPN app is running.
server-change.already-selected-warning: The selected server is already being used.
server-change.change-server-while-connected-confirmati: The VPN protection will be interrupted while changing the server and some data may be transmitted unprotected during the process. Do you want to continue?
server-change.start-same-server-confirmation: You had already selected that server. Do you want to connect to it?

error-page.text: The VPN client app is not available.
error-page.more-info: It was not possible to connect to the VPN client app. This may be due to a configuration error, an unexpected problem with the visor or because you used an invalid public key in the URL.
error-page.more-info-pk: The application cannot be started because you have not specified the visor public key.
error-page.more-info-storage: There has been a conflict when trying to save the data and the application has been closed to prevent errors. This could happen if you open the application in more than one tab or window.
error-page.more-info-pk-change: Please use this application to manage only one VPN client.

connection-info.state-connecting-info: The VPN protection is being activated.
connection-info.state-disconnecting-info: The VPN protection is being deactivated.
connection-info.state-reconnecting-info: The VPN protection is being restored.

status-page.disconnect-confirmation: Are you sure you want to stop the VPN protection?
status-page.problem-connecting-error: It was not possible to connect to the server. The server may be invalid or temporarily down.
status-page.problem-starting-error: It was not possible to start the VPN. Please make sure the base VPN client app is running.
status-page.problem-stopping-error: It was not possible to stop the VPN. Please make sure the base VPN client app is running.
status-page.generic-problem-error: It was not possible to perform the operation. Please make sure the base VPN client app is running.

data.ip-problem-info: There was a problem trying to get the IP. Please verify it using an external service.
data.ip-country-problem-info: There was a problem trying to get the country. Please verify it using an external service.
data.ip-refresh-time-warning: Please wait {{ seconds }} second(s) before refreshing the data.
data.ip-refresh-loading-warning: Please wait for the previous operation to finish.

server-options.connect-without-password-confirmation: The connection will be made without the password. Are you sure you want to continue?
server-options.make-favorite-confirmation: Are you sure you want to mark this server as favorite? It will be removed from the blocked list.
server-options.block-confirmation: Are you sure you want to block this server? It will be removed from the favorites list.
server-options.block-selected-confirmation: Are you sure you want to block the currently selected server? All connections will be closed.
server-options.block-selected-favorite-confirmation: Are you sure you want to block the currently selected server? All connections will be closed and it will be removed from the favorites list.
server-options.remove-from-history-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this server from the history?

server-conditions.selected-info: This is the currently selected server.
server-conditions.blocked-info: This server is in the blocked list.
server-conditions.favorite-info: This server is in the favorites list.
server-conditions.history-info: This server is in the server history.
server-conditions.has-password-info: A password was set for connecting with this server.

server-list.date-info: Last time you used this server.
server-list.country-info: Country where the server is located.
server-list.congestion-rating-info: Rating of the server related to how congested it tends to be.
server-list.latency-rating-info: Rating of the server related to how much latency it tends to have.
server-list.hops-info: How many hops are needed for connecting with the server.
server-list.notes-info: Custom note: {{ custom }} - Original note: {{ original }}
server-list.empty-discovery: Currently there are no VPN servers to show. Please try again later.
server-list.empty-history: There is no history to show.
server-list.empty-favorites: There are no favorite servers to show.
server-list.empty-blocked: There are no blocked servers to show.
server-list.empty-with-filter: No VPN server matches the selected filtering criteria.

add-server-dialog.title: Enter manually
add-server-dialog.pk-length-error: The public key must be 66 characters long.
add-server-dialog.pk-chars-error: The public key must only contain hexadecimal characters.

settings-page.killswitch-info: When active, all network connections will be disabled if the app is running but the VPN protection is interrupted (for temporary errors or any other problem). This avoids data leaks.
settings-page.get-ip-info: When active, the application will use external services to obtain information about the current IP.
settings-page.data-units-info: Allows to select the units that will be used to display the data transmission statistics.
settings-page.working-warning: The system is busy. Please wait for the previous operation to finish.
settings-page.change-while-connected-confirmation: The VPN protection will be interrupted while changing the setting. Do you want to continue?

data-units-modal.title: Data Units
data-units-modal.bits-speed-and-bytes-volume: Bits for speed and bytes for volume (default)
